Class ProxyFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.jcrom.ProxyFactory

public class ProxyFactory
extends Object

Creates CGLIB proxies for lazy loading.

Author:
Olafur Gauti Gudmundsson, Nicolas Dos Santos
